## Converters.jsonPrimitive variable

An converter which converts a supplied `unknown` value to a valid [JsonPrimitive](./ts-json-base.jsonprimitive.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
jsonPrimitive: Converter<JsonPrimitive, IJsonConverterContext>
```
